Pigs
Research is going on to see 
if pigs can be a source of 
hepatitis E infection. This 
infection is dangerous in 
pregnant women, so avoid 
contact with pigs and pig 
faeces. There is no risk of 
hepatitis E from eating cooked 
pork products.
Inherited conditions
Some diseases or conditions 
are inherited from one 
or both parents. These 
include medium chain acyl 
dehydrogenase	deficiency	
(MCADD)	cystic	fibrosis,	
haemophilia, muscular 
dystro
